mapper.sql: ${alias}.id, ${alias}.dsp_id, SUM(${alias}.reqs) reqs, SUM(${alias}.bids) bids, SUM(${alias}.timeouts) timeouts, SUM(${alias}.errs) errs, SUM(${alias}.wins) wins, SUM(${alias}.imps) imps, SUM(${alias}.clks) clks, SUM(${alias}.vimps) vimps, SUM(${alias}.vclks) vclks, SUM(${alias}.cost) cost, ${alias}.created_time, ${alias}.updated_time
mapper.select: SELECT ,d.name dspName ,rp.date ,rp.hour FROM mad_report_dsp rp LEFT JOIN mad_sys_dsp d ON rp.dsp_id = d.id WHERE rp.date >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') AND rp.date <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') GROUP BY rp.dsp_id , rp.date , rp.hour ORDER BY rp.dsp_id

SELECT ,d.name dspName , rp.media_id, m.name mediaName ,rp.date ,rp.hour FROM mad_report_dsp_media rp LEFT JOIN mad_sys_dsp d ON rp.dsp_id = d.id LEFT JOIN mad_sys_media m ON rp.media_id = m.id WHERE rp.date >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') AND rp.date <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d')
GROUP BY rp.dsp_id, rp.media_id , rp.date , rp.hour ORDER BY rp.dsp_id

SELECT , d.name dspName, rp.location, IF(l.domestic=0, '其他', IF(l.code LIKE '%0000', l.name, l.name)) cityName, IF(l.domestic=0, '其他', IF(l.code LIKE '%0000', l.name, lp.name)) provinceName ,rp.date ,rp.hour FROM mad_report_dsp_location rp LEFT JOIN mad_sys_dsp d ON rp.dsp_id = d.id LEFT JOIN mad_dict_location l ON rp.location = l.code LEFT JOIN mad_dict_location lp ON l.parent_code = lp.code WHERE rp.date >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') AND rp.date <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') GROUP BY rp.dsp_id, rp.location , rp.date , rp.hour ORDER BY rp.dsp_id
